attribute.name: array
attribute.validValues: A value expression that evaluates to an iterable collection.
attribute.description: The <foreach> element will iterate over a shallow copy of this collection.

attribute.name: item
attribute.validValues: Any variable name that is valid in the specified data model.
attribute.description: A variable that stores a different item of the collection in each iteration of the loop.

attribute.name: index
attribute.validValues: Any variable name that is valid in the specified data model.
attribute.description: A variable that stores the current iteration index upon each iteration of the foreach loop.
